name: Coloring Pages - Collection 1
description:
Here's a collection of older drawings I drew while as a missionary (2013-2014). We've got:

  • a pirate
  • a princess
  • some children and dinosaurs
  • an ice cream loving ballerina
  • a volleyball player

These are totally free for personal and home use.  If you would like to use them in a class room, online, or commercially, please contact me at (tankitha at tankitha dot com).

If you like my work, please consider supporting me on Patreon!
